dmca.title: Notice of copyright infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
-----Original Message-----
From: Michael Janish [mailto:michael_janish@hotmail.com] 
Sent: Friday, December 08, 2006 10:47 AM
To: copyright@yahoo-inc.com; Copyright; piracyscene@noa.nintendo.com
Subject: Notice of copyright infringement

Please be advised the www.multicadesandmore.com domain is selling
infringing IP materials.  The domain is mirrored on www.arcadejoe.com
The "MAME Cabinets" use pirated game ROM's and the artwork on the
cabinets infringe the IP rights of Nintendo, Namco and others.

It appears the www.multicadesandmore.com site is hosted on yahoo
servers.  
www.arcadejoe.com appears to be hosted on the Planet servers.  Please
take the appropriate actions to remove the site.

For reference, here are links to the MAME EULA and Nintendo's policy.
http://mamedev.org/license.html
http://www.nintendo.com/corp/legal.jsp

_________________________________________________________________
